name: Trio of  Above Ground Seedlings
description:
The life-like seedling sculptures are hand made by designer maker, Clare Tindall, from silicone rubber and terra cotta clay. They are £6 each or three for £15.

The seedlings can include a message inscribed on a stick, such as  ‘Happy Birthday’ or ‘with love’. They are 8-10 cm tall, depending on plant type, diameter, 4.5 cm. 

Please include any personalisation requests in the 'note to seller' box in the Paypal form before you make the payment. Please ring or email us to check any personalisation issues.

name: Box of seedlings
description:
Bring the beauty of nature indoors with our hand made seedlings.

5 seedlings come in a complimentary mini window box for a stunning and original gift, for the reluctant gardner perhaps? or as an alternative to flowers for a special occasion? or simply to brighten up a shelf or table?

Choose any 5 seedlings, personalised, standard or a combination-  for more information on personalisation see 'Say it with...seedlings!'

Please use the 'note to seller' box in the Paypal invoice to let us know of any personalisation requirements prior to confirming your payment.
Please us the contact box or ring us on 07949 267664 if you want to check your personalisation issues first.

The seedlings are hand made from rubber and some recycled materials.

Dimensions:
Box only - L20cm D6cm H5.5 cm
Seedlings- H8-10cm depending on plant type, diameter 3.5cm
